plusMonths
The function adds the specified number of months to the specified date.
Syntax
plusMonths
(date, count)
Setting
Purpose
date
The date to which the specified number of months should be added.
The date can be specified as an
attribute
, a
variable
or an
algorithm
.
count
Number of months to add to the specified date.
Note
The function is added by manual input.
Subtraction is done by passing a negative value to the "count" parameter.
Use example
For example, it is required to determine the date of servicing of elevator equipment, which is carried out six months after the date of commissioning.
The algorithm can be as follows:
